name: Champions Riding Trails 3D: My Free Racing Horse Derby Game
name_original: Champions Riding Trails 3D: My Free Racing Horse Derby Game
description:
++ MULTIPLAYER HORSE RACING GAME! ++

++ FAST HORSES! BEAUTIFUL GRAHPICS! ++


Enjoy our horse racing game!

In it you can race against other jockeys around the world!

Choose the horse you like the most and gallop to victory!

In this game we have:

Multiplayer - Race against your friends and other people around the world!
Leaderboards - Compare your score to your friends!
Simple controls - Just tilt the device!
Beautiful horses - Choose between four beautiful horses!
Addicting music!

Jump on the horse and lets race!
